scripts.dev: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm --filter web dev
scripts.build: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm --filter web build
scripts.db:migrate: pnpm --filter web exec prisma migrate deploy --schema=../../prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:migrate:dev: pnpm --filter web exec prisma migrate dev --schema=../../prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.db:seed: pnpm --filter web exec prisma db seed
scripts.db:reset: pnpm --filter web exec prisma migrate reset --schema=../../prisma/schema.prisma --force
